original_text: Jerusalem, your buildings have become heaps of stones, but now you can all shout together with joy! Sing aloud, because the Lord has comforted his people. He has made Jerusalem safe again. Jerusalem, your buildings have become heaps of stones,
korean_text: 너 예루살렘의 황폐한 곳들아 기쁜 소리를 내어 함께 노래할지어다 이는 여호와께서 그의 백성을 위로하셨고 예루살렘을 구속하셨음이라

sentences.original_text: Jerusalem, your buildings have become heaps of stones
but now you can all shout together with joy!
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 너희 모두 함께 기쁨으로 외칠 수 있구나!

sentences.original_text: because the Lord has comforted his people.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 주께서 그의 백성을 위로하셨기 때문이다.

sentences.original_text: He has made Jerusalem safe again.
Jerusalem, your buildings have become heaps of stones,
